dmca.title: **** SPAM **** RE: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from Jagex Limited for igeq.net
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Adlex Solicitors [mailto:djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk] 
Sent: Friday, March 09, 2007 9:34 AM
To: Response, Legal
Subject: **** SPAM **** RE: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from Jagex Limited
for igeq.net

To whom it may concern,

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the solicitor of the
Intellectual Property Owner and am authorised to act on behalf of the
copyright owner. The information in the notification is accurate. I have
a
good faith belief that the use of the material identified below has not
been
authorized by the owner, its agents or the law. Please promptly remove
the
infringing material or disable access to it in accordance with the
Digital
Millennium Copyright Act.

Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited, UK registered
company number 03982706. Owner of runescape.com ("the game")

Name and/or description of the copyrighted work which has been
infringed:
Images from the game and the RuneScape Logo have been copied. 

Our client's copyright is also infringed by the reproduction of a
significant number of images from the game including the RuneScape Logo.


Description of the Infringing Material: The banner across the top with
the
RuneScape Logo in the middle has been copied from the game. Also the two
totem poles down each side have been copied from within the game.

Location of the Infringing Material: www.igeq.net



Date: 13 March 2006

I can be contacted at:

Name: Adam Taylor
Email: djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk

Regards,



Adam Taylor
Adlex Solicitors

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Legal Response Team
[mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: 12 February 2007 20:14
To: djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk
Subject: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from Jagex Limited for igeq.net]

Please note that the domain referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 02:13 PM --600 (Central Standard Time),
Monday, February 12  2007

--
The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team
https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal
(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103
Fax:: (214) 782-7756



-----Original Message-----
From: Adlex Solicitors [mailto:djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk]
Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2007 9:35 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Jagex Limited for igeq.net

Dear Sirs

We note that the site is back-up. As done previously, please disable the
website.

Yours faithfully

Adlex Solicitors



-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: 09 January 2007 20:19
To: djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Jagex Limited for igeq.net

To Whom It May Concern:

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

Legal Response Team
The Planet



---------


Please see the attached PDF.
